sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing a King of Hearts from a standard deck of 52 cards when drawing one card at random?
message_2:
There is only 1 King of Hearts in a standard deck of 52 cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing a King of Hearts when drawing one card at random is 1 out of 52, or:

1/52 â‰ˆ 0.01923

So, the probability is approximately 0.01923 or 1.923% when expressed as a percentage.
